term_use_text: by logging in you accept our

why_signal_post: Why do you signal this Post?
want_delete_badge: Do you want to delete this badge?
want_block_user: Do you want to block this user?
want_unblock_user: Do you want to unblock this user?

want_delete_comment: Do you want to delete this comment?
want_deactivate_postreport: Do you want to deactivate this post report?
text_suggest_rate_app: You likes this app? Please help us to improve it, give us a note.
text_suggest_share_app: You likes this app? Please help us grow the community by sharing this app with your contacts.
text_share_app: Join the African football community, share your passion for football, get information about your favorite teams, experience live game scores by downloading the Notify Afrofoot application for free at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.notifygroup.afrofoot.
account_been_blocked: Your account has been blocked, click on 'Make a Call' if you have not yet done so to reactivate your account.
you_dont_have_badge: You don't have any fan badge, add it now by clicking on +
user_dont_have_badge: This user doesn't yet have any fan badge
select_club_country: Select the country where your favorite club is located
get_badge_introduction_title: Are you a fan of any particular club? Get your fan badge now!
update_badge_introduction_title: You have {{value}} fan badge, do you want to update it?
appeal_recognize_violated_false: Do not acknowledge that have violated the rules of use
appeal_recognize_violated_true: knowledge that have violated the rules of use
appeal_promise_not_violated_true: Promise to no longer violate the terms of use in the event of account reactivation
appeal_promise_not_violated_false: Is possible to violate terms of use again
is_recognize_violated_terms: Do you acknowledge that you violated the terms of use?
is_recognize_not_violated_terms_after_ac: After your account is reactivated, will you respect the terms of use?
first_launch_description_1: Notify Afro Foot offer you several functionalities, let's take a look ...
first_launch_description_2: Follow the live score of the different matches by being notified when the score has changed.
first_launch_description_3: You will have the rankings, the latest results from the various African competitions.
first_launch_description_4: Get a badge of your favorite club, this badge will be displayed above your in your comments or publications.
first_launch_description_5: Connect and join the large community, you can publish, comment on posts or matches.
first_launch_description_6: Do not hesitate to rate and share the application, this will allow us to work regularly on it in order to improve it.
add_youtube_video_id: Add a YouTube video id for this match
